name: Samurai - Robusto
additionalNotes: Inspired by the samurai code of honor, Samurai cigars are an ode to bravery, loyalty and the pursuit of perfection. Crafted by master blender AJ Fern√°ndez, these cigars combine the highest quality tobacco leaves to create an intense and complex smoking experience. Each puff is a journey through rich and deep flavors, reflecting the rich history and tradition of samurai warriors.
